attributes.action: Help the UK citizens through the present economic situation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Millions of Americans will be given a cash handout of £300 per person and £600 per couple and £150 per child as part of a £85bn economic aid package.
Here in the UK we get high fuel,food prices and taxes and the banks get £Billions. Why can't we have something similar to the Americans?
